duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform massage service or services that best suites the guest needs or wants. Abide by schedule and create SOAP notes in a timely manner.
Set up 30 minutes before shift and shut down the room or rooms for the day.
Provide 60 to 90 minute massages for appointment holders and walk-ins
Learn our products, memberships and add-on services
Design sessions around clients’ specific complaints or problem areas
Listen to clients during massages and adjust technique & pressure to meet their needs
Suggest massage schedules for recurring sessions, follow ups, etc.
Follow dress code and work schedule. Complete S.O.A.P. notes in a timely manner
Create and maintain positive relationships with Team Members

education_certification.credential: Hold current state license to practice massage therapy
